name: it's nothing fancy but the rent's cheap
name_original: it's nothing fancy but the rent's cheap
description:
We've all lived somewhere with weird neighbors, right?

It's hot in your apartment for some reason. Go and find out why, or maybe don't. The game ends when you go to sleep, and everything else is optional. Visit the Elemental Apartments, and stay as long as you'd like.

This game was made in Video Game Development Club as a solo project for the month of September. I wrote, designed, and composed. The theme was Elemental.

Content Warning: Drug References, Spiders

Made using Bitsy by Adam Le Doux: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

The Old Apartment: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/the-old-apartment
